description:
Installs the portable executable, h-opc-cli.exe (https://github.com/hylasoft-usa/h-opc/tree/v0.9.0#command-line) into the windows PATH. 
			h-opc-cli is a tool for reading, writing, and monitoring OPC UA and DA servers from the command line.
			Call it from the command line like so: "h-opc-cli.exe [OpcType] [server-url]".
author: Hyla Soft USA,  Inc.
